info.author: Erik Näslund
info.description:
==========================================
Cocoon - Self contained python deployments
==========================================

Cocoon aims to provide a way to perform self contained, single executable, python deployments of
web application. It includes support for blue/green zero downtime deployments and rollbacks by standardizing
on a small interface which all Coccon bundles must adhere to.
